phases.phase_description: Focus on environment setup, meta-learning techniques, and initial diagnostics.
Dive into linear algebra, calculus, and basic machine learning approaches.

objectives.objective_description: Learn Feynman Technique, spaced repetition, reflection habits.
objectives.completion_criteria: Explain Feynman technique in own words; set up daily reflection in Arcanaeum.

objectives.objective_description: Complete baseline worksheets in linear algebra, calculus, basic Python/ML.
objectives.completion_criteria: Identify top 2-3 weaknesses to address next.

objectives.objective_description: Vectors, matrices, systems of equations, eigenvalues, SVD.
objectives.completion_criteria: Implement matrix ops, confirm SVD understanding via puzzle or mini-project.
Solve minimal gradient descent problem by hand; confirm with code.

tasks.title: Install Tools & Libraries
tasks.description: Ensure Python, GPU drivers, CUDA, Arcanaeum are installed. Setup environment (conda or virtualenv).

tasks.title: Learn Feynman/Spaced Repetition/Interleaving
tasks.description: Read short articles and watch videos explaining these study methods. Decide how to incorporate daily reflection in Arcanaeum.

tasks.title: Linear Algebra Baseline Worksheet
tasks.description: Complete baseline worksheet in linear algebra to identify knowledge gaps.

tasks.title: Calculus Baseline Worksheet
tasks.description: Complete baseline worksheet in calculus to confirm readiness for deeper ML math.

tasks.title: Study Vectors & Vector Spaces
tasks.description: Read Strang's Ch. 1.1-1.2. Implement small coding examples to confirm understanding.

tasks.title: Matrix Operations & Gaussian Elimination
tasks.description: Implement a basic Gauss elimination in Python/C++. Possibly do a small puzzle on matrix transformations.

tasks.title: Derivatives & Differentiation Rules
tasks.description: Focus on product, quotient, chain rules. Implement a small symbolic derivative or code snippet to verify correctness.

tasks.title: Partial Derivatives & Gradients
tasks.description: Extend to multivariable calculus. Possibly do a small puzzle: optimize a 2D function by gradient descent manually, confirm with code.
